channel.title: Blog on General Arcade
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on General Arcade

item.title: Sample Post
item.description:
This is a sample blog post written in Markdown. Replace with your content.

You can add images to your post using the image shortcode:

The featured image (specified in front matter or auto-detected) will be displayed at the top of the post and used as preview in blog listing and navigation buttons.
